Kane Pour

Graphic Designer
Contact

I have been with the University of Florida Lifelong Learning since 2018 — as a graphic designer for the marketing arm of our video production group.

I've had my hand in a number of things, including: branding, web graphics, storyboards, and video backgrounds.
